title: Sergei Orlov (footballer, born 1989)
text:
Sergei Aleksandrovich Orlov (; born 20 April 1989) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="Armenia">Armenia</a>n club <a href="Noravank%20SC">Noravank SC</a>.
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Fakel%20Voronezh">FC Fakel Voronezh</a> in 2018.
